message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a serious offer.
